entry.tran: 非官方的；未经正式批准的；非正式的
entry.def: An unofficial action or statement is not organized or approved by a person or group in authority.

example.ex: Staff voted to continue an unofficial strike in support of seven colleagues who were dismissed last week...
example.tran: 职工投票决定继续进行非正式罢工，以支持上周被解雇的7名同事。

example.ex: Official reports put the death toll at under one hundred, but unofficial estimates speak of at least two hundred dead.
example.tran: 官方报道说死亡人数在100人以下，但非官方估计至少有200人死亡。
